26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_therm_base.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:35 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "priv.h"
30
31int
32nvkm_therm_temp_get(struct nvkm_therm *therm)
33{
34 if (therm->func->temp_get)
35 return therm->func->temp_get(therm);
36 return -ENODEV;
37}
38
39static int
40nvkm_therm_update_trip(struct nvkm_therm *therm)
41{
42 struct nvbios_therm_trip_point *trip = therm->fan->bios.trip,
43 *cur_trip = NULL,
44 *last_trip = therm->last_trip;
45 u8 temp = therm->func->temp_get(therm);
46 u16 duty, i;
47
48 /* look for the trip point corresponding to the current temperature */
49 cur_trip = NULL;
50 for (i = 0; i < therm->fan->bios.nr_fan_trip; i++) {
51 if (temp >= trip[i].temp)
52 cur_trip = &trip[i];
53 }
54
55 /* account for the hysteresis cycle */
56 if (last_trip && temp <= (last_trip->temp) &&
57 temp > (last_trip->temp - last_trip->hysteresis))
58 cur_trip = last_trip;
59
60 if (cur_trip) {
61 duty = cur_trip->fan_duty;
62 therm->last_trip = cur_trip;
63 } else {
64 duty = 0;
65 therm->last_trip = NULL;
66 }
67
68 return duty;
69}
70
71static int
72nvkm_therm_update_linear(struct nvkm_therm *therm)
73{
74 u8 linear_min_temp = therm->fan->bios.linear_min_temp;
75 u8 linear_max_temp = therm->fan->bios.linear_max_temp;
76 u8 temp = therm->func->temp_get(therm);
77 u16 duty;
78
79 /* handle the non-linear part first */
80 if (temp < linear_min_temp)
81 return therm->fan->bios.min_duty;
82 else if (temp > linear_max_temp)
83 return therm->fan->bios.max_duty;
84
85 /* we are in the linear zone */
86 duty = (temp - linear_min_temp);
87 duty *= (therm->fan->bios.max_duty - therm->fan->bios.min_duty);
88 duty /= (linear_max_temp - linear_min_temp);
89 duty += therm->fan->bios.min_duty;
90 return duty;
91}
92
93static void
94nvkm_therm_update(struct nvkm_therm *therm, int mode)
95{
96 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &therm->subdev;
97 struct nvkm_timer *tmr = subdev->device->timer;
98 unsigned long flags;
99 bool immd = true;
100 bool poll = true;
101 int duty = -1;
102
103 spin_lock_irqsave(&therm->lock, flags);
104 if (mode < 0)
105 mode = therm->mode;
106 therm->mode = mode;
107
108 switch (mode) {
109 case NVKM_THERM_CTRL_MANUAL:
110 nvkm_timer_alarm_cancel(tmr, &therm->alarm);
111 duty = nvkm_therm_fan_get(therm);
112 if (duty < 0)
113 duty = 100;
114 poll = false;
115 break;
116 case NVKM_THERM_CTRL_AUTO:
117 switch(therm->fan->bios.fan_mode) {
118 case NVBIOS_THERM_FAN_TRIP:
119 duty = nvkm_therm_update_trip(therm);
120 break;
121 case NVBIOS_THERM_FAN_LINEAR:
122 duty = nvkm_therm_update_linear(therm);
123 break;
124 case NVBIOS_THERM_FAN_OTHER:
125 if (therm->cstate)
126 duty = therm->cstate;
127 poll = false;
128 break;
129 }
130 immd = false;
131 break;
132 case NVKM_THERM_CTRL_NONE:
133 default:
134 nvkm_timer_alarm_cancel(tmr, &therm->alarm);
135 poll = false;
136 }
137
138 if (poll)
139 nvkm_timer_alarm(tmr, 1000000000ULL, &therm->alarm);
140 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&therm->lock, flags);
141
142 if (duty >= 0) {
143#if 0 /* XXXMRG one log per second is a little excessive */
144 nvkm_debug(subdev, "FAN target request: %d%%\n", duty);
145#endif
146 nvkm_therm_fan_set(therm, immd, duty);
147 }
148}
149
150int
151nvkm_therm_cstate(struct nvkm_therm *therm, int fan, int dir)
152{
153 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &therm->subdev;
154 if (!dir || (dir < 0 && fan < therm->cstate) ||
155 (dir > 0 && fan > therm->cstate)) {
156 nvkm_debug(subdev, "default fan speed -> %d%%\n", fan);
157 therm->cstate = fan;
158 nvkm_therm_update(therm, -1);
159 }
160 return 0;
161}
162
163static void
164nvkm_therm_alarm(struct nvkm_alarm *alarm)
165{
166 struct nvkm_therm *therm =
167 container_of(alarm, struct nvkm_therm, alarm);
168 nvkm_therm_update(therm, -1);
169}
170
171int
172nvkm_therm_fan_mode(struct nvkm_therm *therm, int mode)
173{
174 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &therm->subdev;
175 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
176 static const char *name[] = {
177 "disabled",
178 "manual",
179 "automatic"
180 };
181
182 /* The default PPWR ucode on fermi interferes with fan management */
183 if ((mode >= ARRAY_SIZE(name)) ||
184 (mode != NVKM_THERM_CTRL_NONE && device->card_type >= NV_C0 &&
185 !device->pmu))
186 return -EINVAL;
187
188 /* do not allow automatic fan management if the thermal sensor is
189 * not available */
190 if (mode == NVKM_THERM_CTRL_AUTO &&
191 therm->func->temp_get(therm) < 0)
192 return -EINVAL;
193
194 if (therm->mode == mode)
195 return 0;
196
197 nvkm_debug(subdev, "fan management: %s\n", name[mode]);
198 nvkm_therm_update(therm, mode);
199 return 0;
200}
201
202int
203nvkm_therm_attr_get(struct nvkm_therm *therm, enum nvkm_therm_attr_type type)
204{
205 switch (type) {
206 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_FAN_MIN_DUTY:
207 return therm->fan->bios.min_duty;
208 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_FAN_MAX_DUTY:
209 return therm->fan->bios.max_duty;
210 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_FAN_MODE:
211 return therm->mode;
212 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_FAN_BOOST:
213 return therm->bios_sensor.thrs_fan_boost.temp;
214 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_FAN_BOOST_HYST:
215 return therm->bios_sensor.thrs_fan_boost.hysteresis;
216 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_DOWN_CLK:
217 return therm->bios_sensor.thrs_down_clock.temp;
218 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_DOWN_CLK_HYST:
219 return therm->bios_sensor.thrs_down_clock.hysteresis;
220 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_CRITICAL:
221 return therm->bios_sensor.thrs_critical.temp;
222 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_CRITICAL_HYST:
223 return therm->bios_sensor.thrs_critical.hysteresis;
224 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_SHUTDOWN:
225 return therm->bios_sensor.thrs_shutdown.temp;
226 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_SHUTDOWN_HYST:
227 return therm->bios_sensor.thrs_shutdown.hysteresis;
228 }
229
230 return -EINVAL;
231}
232
233int
234nvkm_therm_attr_set(struct nvkm_therm *therm,
235 enum nvkm_therm_attr_type type, int value)
236{
237 switch (type) {
238 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_FAN_MIN_DUTY:
239 if (value < 0)
240 value = 0;
241 if (value > therm->fan->bios.max_duty)
242 value = therm->fan->bios.max_duty;
243 therm->fan->bios.min_duty = value;
244 return 0;
245 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_FAN_MAX_DUTY:
246 if (value < 0)
247 value = 0;
248 if (value < therm->fan->bios.min_duty)
249 value = therm->fan->bios.min_duty;
250 therm->fan->bios.max_duty = value;
251 return 0;
252 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_FAN_MODE:
253 return nvkm_therm_fan_mode(therm, value);
254 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_FAN_BOOST:
255 therm->bios_sensor.thrs_fan_boost.temp = value;
256 therm->func->program_alarms(therm);
257 return 0;
258 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_FAN_BOOST_HYST:
259 therm->bios_sensor.thrs_fan_boost.hysteresis = value;
260 therm->func->program_alarms(therm);
261 return 0;
262 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_DOWN_CLK:
263 therm->bios_sensor.thrs_down_clock.temp = value;
264 therm->func->program_alarms(therm);
265 return 0;
266 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_DOWN_CLK_HYST:
267 therm->bios_sensor.thrs_down_clock.hysteresis = value;
268 therm->func->program_alarms(therm);
269 return 0;
270 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_CRITICAL:
271 therm->bios_sensor.thrs_critical.temp = value;
272 therm->func->program_alarms(therm);
273 return 0;
274 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_CRITICAL_HYST:
275 therm->bios_sensor.thrs_critical.hysteresis = value;
276 therm->func->program_alarms(therm);
277 return 0;
278 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_SHUTDOWN:
279 therm->bios_sensor.thrs_shutdown.temp = value;
280 therm->func->program_alarms(therm);
281 return 0;
282 case NVKM_THERM_ATTR_THRS_SHUTDOWN_HYST:
283 therm->bios_sensor.thrs_shutdown.hysteresis = value;
284 therm->func->program_alarms(therm);
285 return 0;
286 }
287
288 return -EINVAL;
289}
290
291static void
292nvkm_therm_intr(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
293{
294 struct nvkm_therm *therm = nvkm_therm(subdev);
295 if (therm->func->intr)
296 therm->func->intr(therm);
297}
298
299static int
300nvkm_therm_fini(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev, bool suspend)
301{
302 struct nvkm_therm *therm = nvkm_therm(subdev);
303
304 if (therm->func->fini)
305 therm->func->fini(therm);
306
307 nvkm_therm_fan_fini(therm, suspend);
308 nvkm_therm_sensor_fini(therm, suspend);
309
310 if (suspend) {
311 therm->suspend = therm->mode;
312 therm->mode = NVKM_THERM_CTRL_NONE;
313 }
314
315 return 0;
316}
317
318static int
319nvkm_therm_oneinit(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
320{
321 struct nvkm_therm *therm = nvkm_therm(subdev);
322 nvkm_therm_sensor_ctor(therm);
323 nvkm_therm_ic_ctor(therm);
324 nvkm_therm_fan_ctor(therm);
325 nvkm_therm_fan_mode(therm, NVKM_THERM_CTRL_AUTO);
326 nvkm_therm_sensor_preinit(therm);
327 return 0;
328}
329
330static int
331nvkm_therm_init(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
332{
333 struct nvkm_therm *therm = nvkm_therm(subdev);
334
335 therm->func->init(therm);
336
337 if (therm->suspend >= 0) {
338 /* restore the pwm value only when on manual or auto mode */
339 if (therm->suspend > 0)
340 nvkm_therm_fan_set(therm, true, therm->fan->percent);
341
342 nvkm_therm_fan_mode(therm, therm->suspend);
343 }
344
345 nvkm_therm_sensor_init(therm);
346 nvkm_therm_fan_init(therm);
347 return 0;
348}
349
350static void *
351nvkm_therm_dtor(struct nvkm_subdev *subdev)
352{
353 struct nvkm_therm *therm = nvkm_therm(subdev);
354 kfree(therm->fan);
355 return therm;
356}
357
358static const struct nvkm_subdev_func
359nvkm_therm = {
360 .dtor = nvkm_therm_dtor,
361 .oneinit = nvkm_therm_oneinit,
362 .init = nvkm_therm_init,
363 .fini = nvkm_therm_fini,
364 .intr = nvkm_therm_intr,
365};
366
367int
368nvkm_therm_new_(const struct nvkm_therm_func *func, struct nvkm_device *device,
369 int index, struct nvkm_therm **ptherm)
370{
371 struct nvkm_therm *therm;
372
373 if (!(therm = *ptherm = kzalloc(sizeof(*therm), GFP_KERNEL)))
374 return -ENOMEM;
375
376 nvkm_subdev_ctor(&nvkm_therm, device, index, 0, &therm->subdev);
377 therm->func = func;
378
379 nvkm_alarm_init(&therm->alarm, nvkm_therm_alarm);
380 spin_lock_init(&therm->lock);
381 spin_lock_init(&therm->sensor.alarm_program_lock);
382
383 therm->fan_get = nvkm_therm_fan_user_get;
384 therm->fan_set = nvkm_therm_fan_user_set;
385 therm->attr_get = nvkm_therm_attr_get;
386 therm->attr_set = nvkm_therm_attr_set;
387 therm->mode = therm->suspend = -1; /* undefined */
388 return 0;
389}
